title: NFL Safety Measures, Gronk's New Scene, NBA MVP Decision
itunes:title: NFL Safety Measures, Gronk's New Scene, NBA MVP Decision
description:
In this full show edition of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--shares his thoughts on recent tweets by NFL stars addressing the NFL's lack of pandemic safety protocols as the start of training camp draws near. Also, tight end Rob Gronkowski needed a change in culture with his latest NFL team, while the Tampa Bay Buccaneers need to change their overall culture of losing. Finally, Doug wades through the NBA's MVP candidates. Guests include: Geoff Schwartz, Albert Breer, Mario Chalmers and Mark Schlereth.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
